results.content: Really good but a very short course
results.content_html: Really good but a very short course

results.content: The company I work for is implementing Stimulus.js in parts of their application. I want to learn the basics before I end up working on some of those components. So far this is very easy to follow.

results.content:
Didn't cover anything more complex than a basic hello world example.

Was hoping for a slightly more complex example.  Maybe a very simple CRUD example like a TODO list or something.
